data.title: How to Install a Magnaflow Tip on 2012 Dodge Challenger
data.tags: Magnaflow Exhaust Tips, 2011 Dodge Challenger, How to install exhaust tips Dodge Challenger
data.description: See how easy it is - and each simple step it takes - to remove your stock tip and replace it with an eye-catching Magnaflow exhaust tip.

asset.title: 2012 Dodge Challenger MagnaFlow Tip install
asset.description:
How easy is it to install MagnaFlow tips? We show you step by step how to remove stock tips & install ours on the 2012 Dodge Challenger in our tech center.

These tips are designed for this application (2009-2013 Dodge Challenger.) The factory tip unbolts and allows the use of the aftermarket, Original Equipment inspired style quad tip to be added to the stock or Magnaflow exhaust for factory tips, with minimal work.

Learn more: http://www.magnaflow.com/02product/displayapplications.asp?partnumber=35221

data.title: How to Install a Magnaflow Quad Tip Exhaust on 2011 Mustang
data.tags: Magnaflow Exhaust Systems, Quad Tip, Performance exhaust, fascia modification, Ford Mustang, 2011 Mustang, how to install
data.description: Installing this kit requires the purchase of a custom Fascia or modifying your stock fascia. This informative video will show you the entire process!

asset.title: 2011 Mustang Quad Tip Installation
asset.description: Thanks for purchasing a MAGNAFLOW Quad Tip exhaust system for your 2010 and newer Mustang. In order to install your kit you will be required to either purchase a custom Fascia or modify your Stock Fascia. In the following video I will illustrate the process on how to use the MagnaFlow supplied template and make the necessary modifications to complete the install on your Stock Fascia. If you have the safety gear, the tools and the time, this can be done in your own garage but at MagnaFlow we do recommend professional installation. Most importantly, have fun making this upgrade and enjoy the added performance and of course that MagnaFlow sound.
asset.author: magnaflowtv

data.title: Flowmaster  Install -  Force II Cat-back Exhaust System 2009-2016 Toyota Tundra

asset.title: Install: Flowmaster Force II Cat-back Exhaust System 2009-2016 Toyota Tundra - 817486
asset.description:
Questions? Give us a call (707) 544-4761
View this product: http://bit.ly/1KAaytw
Visit Flowmaster's website: http://bit.ly/1fyGZRh

Flowmaster Part #817486

Application:
Fits 2009 to 2016 Toyota Tundra with a 5.7L I-Force V8 engine and 4.6L engine, fits 2 and 4 wheel drive, will not fit regular cab and short bed or the double cab and long bed configurations. Will only fit models built after 08/01/2008.

Features:
For the person who is looking for a complete Cat-back dual exhaust system with a moderate tone. With easy fit in mind, these systems are mandrel bent for maximum performance and include specially selected mufflers. Force II systems deliver a moderate interior and exterior tone and are suited to the enthusiast who wants their performance to be heard. Like all Flowmaster systems, the benefits include improved throttle response, power and mileage. Designed for an easy fit, these systems include all necessary parts and hardware for easy installation.
✓ Mandrel bent 16 gauge stainless steel tubing
✓ Moderate Sound exterior exhaust tone
✓ Includes hangers and hardware for easy installation
✓ Dyno tuned for maximum performance

data.description:
Applications:
Flowmasters 2009 to 2014 Ford F-150 with a 4.6L or 5.0L or 5.4L engine, fits 2 and 4 wheel drive and all wheelbases. Installation Product #817478

Features:
For the person who is looking for a complete Cat-back dual exhaust system with an quieter tone. With easy fit in mind, these systems are mandrel bent for maximum performance and include specially selected mufflers. This Force II system delivers a moderate exterior tone and mild interior tone, and is suited to customers looking for efficiency improvements without a lot of noise. Like all Flowmaster systems, the benefits include improved throttle response, power and mileage. Designed for an easy fit, these systems include all necessary parts and hardware for easy installation.

data.title: How to Install a K&N Air Intake System on a Chevy Corvette Z06 7.0L V8
data.tags: K&N, Cold air intake, Chevy Corvette, Z06, K&N intake
data.description:
Watch this K&N 63 Series AirCharger High-Flow Intake get installed on a Chevrolet Corvette Z06 7.0L V8 and see just what performance gains you can expect.

http://www.autoanything.com/air-intakes/61A1916A0A0.aspx

asset.title: How to Install K&N Air Intake System Chevy Corvette Z06 7.0L V8 - 63-3060-1
asset.description:
Buy here: http://www.autoanything.com/air-intakes/61A1916A0A0.aspx

Watch step-by-step instructions for installing the K&N 63 Series AirCharger High-Flow Intake Kit on a Chevrolet Corvette Z06 7.0 liter V8. The cold air intake system comes with parts designed to match the rest of the vehicle components. 

The K & N Air Intake System is intended to boost power and acceleration by reducing restriction in the air intake path. K&N  63 series part # 63-3060-1 is designed to fit Chevy Corvette Z06 with 7.0L V8 engines. 

Check out other K&N products: http://www.autoanything.com/brands/102A399.aspx

Learn about other air intake systems: http://www.autoanything.com/air-intakes/20A50096A1.aspx
asset.author: AutoAnything

data.title: How to Install ARIES 6" Oval Side Bars on Chevy Silverado 1500 (Bracket 4495)
data.tags: Aries, 6" Oval Nerf Bar, Side Bar, Chevy Silverado 1500, Nerf Bars
data.description: See the step-by-step process and necessary tools needed for this drill-free installation.

asset.title: ARIES Side Bar Install: 6" Ovals on Chevy Silverado 1500 (Bracket 4495)
asset.description:
This video demonstrates the installation of the ARIES 6" Oval Side Bars on a 2015 Chevy Silverado 1500 Regular Cab.  These side bars are available in a stainless steel finish or black powder coated aluminum.  For this installation, we used the 4495 bracket.  These brackets are vehicle specific.

Features Include:
304 stainless steel or black lightweight aluminum
OE style tubular construction
Extra-wide, anti-skid step pad

(4495 Bracket) Vehicle Coverage:
2007-2015 Chevy Silverado 1500 Regular Cab
2007-2015 GMC Sierra 1500 Regular Cab

Part #
4495 (Bracket)
S2853 (Stainless steel side bar)
B2853 (Black side bar)
asset.author: ARIES Automotive

Features Include:
Six configurations in carbon steel
Ten configurations in aluminum
Durable T6 Aluminum Alloy
Allows for additional lighting
Universal winch housing with 10,000 lb. capacity
